data.title: Rugrats Adventure Game Characters
data.meta_description: Point-and-click adventure game where Nickelodeon's famous talking babies must rescue Tommy Pickles's Reptar doll from being eaten by monstrous garbage truck Hubert and stop aliens from invading the Earth.
data.text:
Angelica Pickles

Angelica is the older cousin of bald-headed baby Tommy. She is known for antagonizing and manipulating the Rugrats gang, sometimes in the name of cookies.

Chuckie Finster

Chuckie Finster is the son of Chaz Finster, and is the oldest of a mischievous group of infants. He is a total scaredy-cat who is often afraid of many things.

Didi Pickles

Didi is the mother of Tommy and Dil. She is careful to follow the parenting techniques of Dr. Lipschitz.

Lou Pickles

The paternal grandfather of Tommy and Dil Pickles, and the father of Stu, Lou likes to take frequent naps and tell stories about his past that involve the number fifteen. He is beloved by his grandchildren and their friends.

Phil DeVille

Phil DeVille and his twin Lil go on adventures with Tommy Pickles and the rest of the babies. They both love gross things like eating worms and insects or playing in the mud.

Reptar

Reptar is a fictional dinosaur from the Rugrats universe. He appears on TV in Rugrats, and the children believe him to be real.

Stu Pickles

Stu Pickles is the husband of Didi, father of Tommy and Dil, and uncle of Angelica. He is an inventor, although his projects usually don't turn out very well.

Tommy Pickles

Tommy Pickles is the son of Stu Pickles, and the ringleader of a group of adventuring infants. He is also the main protagonist of the TV series "Rugrats". His brother's name is Dil Pickles.
